mapper.select: select count(1) as cnt from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '100' and TYPE = '${msg_type}' and NVL(REQDTTM, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.update: UPDATE ${msg_table} SET STATUS = '101' WHERE ROWID IN ( SELECT ROWID FROM ( SELECT ROWID FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '100' AND TYPE = '${msg_type}' AND NVL(REQDTTM, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY PRIORITY ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 500 )
mapper.select: SELECT SEQNO, 'PH' as TYPE, MSG, MSG as MSG_SMS, CASE WHEN "TYPE" = 'S' THEN CASE WHEN LENGTHB(MSG) <= 90 THEN 'S' ELSE 'L' END ELSE 'L' END AS SMSKIND, DESTNO AS DESTNO, CALLBACK, BILLID, TITLE, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGDT, CASE WHEN REQDTTM IS NULL THEN '00000000000000' ELSE TO_CHAR(REQDTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') END AS REQDTTM FROM ${msg_table} WHERE TYPE = '${msg_type}' and STATUS = '101'
mapper.update: update ${msg_table} set STATUS = '102' where STATUS = '101' and TYPE = '${msg_type}'
update ${msg_table} set STATUS = '100' where STATUS = '101' and TYPE = '${msg_type}'
